paragraph.paragraph:
It is possible to copy the current call stack to the clipboard (../../../../../images/eiffelstudio/icons/10x10/general_copy_icon.png) or to a text file (../../../../../images/eiffelstudio/icons/10x10/general_save_icon.png). This may be useful to indicate to other people of a team where an error occurred. After the button is clicked, a dialog is popped up that prompts for a place where to save the
10_call_stack_tool.xml call stack (if the selected file already exists, it is overwritten).
